issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Fix size 0 case in arena malloc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16191](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16191). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The size 0 case in arena malloc is causing sporadic errors due to null pointer being returned to functions like convert_from which treat this as an error.
